item.title: Integrating a typing assistant with AEM to provide grammar suggestions during content creation
item.description:
Grammarly is a service that hooks up to an input or textarea on a page and provides suggestions on the content’s grammar. This makes for a neat little integration with the AEM Text/RTE component. This can be added on to the WCM Core Text component or any component that uses an RTE.

Create the editor clientlib

First thing we need is a clientlib we can load into the AEM page editor.
